S04n511:1: tasmāttarhi kumāra apramatto bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam,
S04n511:2: apramattasya hi kumāra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na durlabhā bhavatyanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S04n511:4: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ apramatto bhavati ?
S04n511:5: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaśīlo bhavati |
S04n511:6: iha kumāra pariśuddhaśīlo bodhisattvaḥ apramatto bhavati |
S04n511:7: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaśīlo bhavati |
S04n511:8: iha kumāra pariśuddhaśīlo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avirahito bhavati sarvajñatācittena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu |
S04n511:10: tān śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru |
S04n511:12: deśeme kumāra anuśaṃsā dānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya |
S04n511:26: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsā dānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ||
S04n511:27: tatredamucyate - nigṛhītaṃ si mātsaryaṃ tyāgacittaṃ ca bṛṃhitam |
S04n511:30: jātamātrasya cittaṃ si tyāga eva pravartate |
S04n511:37: mṛdū hastau ca pādau ca bhaviṣyanti na durlabhāḥ |
S04n511:40: mātsaryacittaṃ si na jātu bhoti tyāgeṣu citta ramate'sya nityam |
S04n511:41: priyaśca bhoti bahusattvakoṭināṃ amatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ || 5 ||
S04n511:43: mahādhane cāpi kule sa jāyate jātasya tyāge ramate mano'sya |
S04n511:44: ādattasāraśca karoti kāla- mamatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ || 6 ||
S04n511:49: sya sadaiva jāyate amatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ || 7 ||
S04n511:51: kalyāṇamitrāsya na bhonti durlabhā buddhāṃśca yo paśyati śrāvakāṃśca |
S04n511:52: dṛṣṭvā ca tān pūjayate prasanno amatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ || 8 ||
